positions.title: Freelancer
positions.description: Design and development for video games, mobile and web application products using different tools and technologies, adding different Machine Learning algorithms implementation for data classification, AI behaviors in video games, and innovative automatized solutions.

positions.title: Intern ML Developer
positions.description: Algorithm development and implementation for a handwritten Arabic character segmentation by pre-processing data for character segmentation, and building an ad-hoc Convolutional Neural Network model that is elegantly configured for high accuracy.
